DOC.brief_title: Comparison Simultaneous Endotracheal Tube Insertion With GlideScope Use
DOC.detailed_description: Patients present elective surgery require orotracheal intubation randomize ETT insert pharynx simultaneous GlideScope insertion ETT advance GlideScope guidance trachea , , intubated common fashion GlideScope insert first ETT advance via pharynx trachea . The primary outcome time intubation . Secondary outcome include : 1 ) Ease intubation note operator ( measure 10-cm Visual Analogue Scale ) 2 ) Number intubation attempt 3 ) Number failures intubate 4 ) Use external laryngeal pressure 5 ) Laryngoscopic grade distribution
DOC.criteria: 1 ) Adult patient book elective surgery require orotracheal intubation 1 . Any patient use GlideScope contraindicate opinion attend anesthesiologist . 2 . Any patient cervical spine abnormality . 3 . Any patient know probable difficult airway . 4 . Any patient requiring rapid sequence induction .
